description: You find yourself in a wizards forest cabin filled with alchemical instruments and glowing runes.

rooms.description: Scrolls and books lie open on a rune-etched desk. A cauldron bubbles mysteriously.
Glowing herbs sway in the moonlight. A stone arch leads deeper into the forest.
Dusty tomes line every wall. A magical barrier shimmers near a hidden door.

bubbling_cauldron.name: Bubbling Cauldron
bubbling_cauldron.description: A large iron cauldron with a mysterious glowing liquid inside.

ancient_scroll.name: Ancient Scroll
ancient_scroll.description: A yellowed scroll covered in arcane symbols and spells.

glowing_crystal.name: Glowing Crystal
glowing_crystal.description: A crystal orb that pulses with magical energy.

use.successMessage: The crystal glows brighter in your hand, channeling magical energy.
use.failureMessage: The crystal's power needs to be directed at something.

luminescent_herb.name: Luminescent Herb
luminescent_herb.description: A magical herb that glows softly in the moonlight.

use.successMessage: The herb releases a sweet, magical fragrance as you crush it gently.
use.failureMessage: The herb needs to be combined with other ingredients.

stone_archway.name: Stone Archway
stone_archway.description: An ancient archway covered in ivy and runes.

book.name: Spell Book
book.description: A leather-bound tome filled with powerful spells.

magical_barrier.name: Magical Barrier
magical_barrier.description: A shimmering magical barrier blocking a hidden passage.

use.failureMessage: The barrier resists your attempts. You need magical power to dispel it.

wizard's_wand.name: Wizard's Wand
wizard's_wand.description: An ornate wooden wand that tingles with power.

use.successMessage: The wand responds to your will, crackling with arcane energy.
use.failureMessage: The wand needs a target for its magic.
